phrases: We ask thee, Father, to forgive us our sins and grant us eternal life.
When we leave this world, may we go peacefully into the arms of our Lord.
We offer this prayer to our savior, the Lord Jesus Christ.
As her soul departs from this world, may she find eternal peace in the next.
You have been dragging your feet, and now you are running late.
You know that the dinner tonight is important!
It is fine, I will do it myself.
So you say, but If you had gotten ready earlier, I would not have to be nagging you-
Will that girl be at the dinner party as well?
You are her escort, are not you?
I will just have to put up with it.
If I want my father to accept Emma, I cannot show any sign of weakness.
That is not what I meant.
And stop being so familar, you should call her Miss Emma...
Even if both families encourage the match, it is up to the couple themselves in the end.
You cannot guess the feelings of a woman in love.
Miss Eleanor, I cannot pull any tighter.
It might be fashionable to have a tiny waist, but this is very bad for your health.
There is a trick to opening the window.
You have to push and lift at the same time.
It is small and old, but it will have to do.
The kitchen will take a little longer.
I have asked my mates to help out.
They will get rid of anything you do not need next week.
The funeral may be over, but you should still tell him, you know.
You realize you do not have to wear a maid uniform anymore, right?
It is just force of habit...
Well, you were here a long time.
If you need anything, just let me know.
Emma, could I have some tea?
Lord Melville, thank you for your invitation.
Eleanor, you are more beautiful every time I see you.
The same to you dear aunt, you are as beautiful as ever.
My, even your words have the grace of a true lady.
Um... I hope you do not mind escorting me.
Mr. Jones suggested that I come, and I could not help but comply...
Perhaps it was impudent of me.
You have seemed a little out of sorts recently...
Ladies and gentlemen, I am delighted that you have gathered here tonight.
I hope you will enjoy yourselves.
Even cooked, a sea turtle still ends up swimming in water, does not it?
Lobster and sole cooked in an orange sauce.
All right, move on to the sauce then, please.
All right, move on to the sauce then, please.
You are fired if you drop it.
Even if you cannot handle wine to begin with, you get used to it the more you drink.
The first time I drank, I made a terrible mistake.
I was with people who loved to drink, so l could not refuse when they offered me more.
Port wine, Hock, Claret, Sherry, there was even Madeira, I think...
When the ladies retired to the next room, I trod on the hem of the lady next to me.
I have yet to make a single mistake, you know.
My mother was worried before I left the house tonight.
She told me not to disgrace the traditions of our family...
Mother is always talking about it, tradition this, tradition that.
After all, it is something that has been handed down through many generations.
But, I despise the idea of upholding tradition simply for the sake of it.
Oh, I do not mean to criticize your mother.
I am just speaking of the topic in general.
Do you want something to eat?
I will be leaving here, you know.
From now on, you will have to search for another house.
That was not much at all, I am fine.
Even the mistress was praising you!
There you go, being modest again.
Come now, we are not finished yet!
We still have to clean up.
If you start daydreaming and break a valuable plate,
you will be packing your bags come tomorrow morning!
I must say, it is delightful to dine with a young couple like yourselves.
Young love is clearer than crystal, more vibrant than gardens in June.
That is not... not really the case here, sir.
I invited the young lady to dinner.
Of course, I would be happy if love were to blossom.
Well then, One sees the elegance of the rose in the bud.
It appears the salon is ready, so the ladies can now retire.
I am sure the gentlemen wish to smoke their cigars.
I wish I could take my corset off...
Ah, um... is William always at home?
I wonder if he likes round games.
Perhaps I should ask him next time.
But my brother is so unpredictable.
He does not make for very good company.
I really enjoy talking with him!
I wonder... ifWilliam already has someone that he likes?
Miss Eleanor, are you all right?
I told you I am fine, did not l?
I apologize for my father's rudeness earlier.
I did not mind at all.
Actually, there is something I have to tell you, Eleanor.
Truthfully, I do not know whether I should tell you...
In fact, it may make you uncomfortable.
However, to be silent any longer would be dishonest to my...
I am not feeling very well.
Maybe I had too much wine, I am still not used to it.
So I must excuse myself for tonight.
Oh, then I will escort you home.
I will go home alone, tonight.
It is terrible that after all this work, we never get to eat the food.
We do get to eat it.
I do not mean the leftovers!
They are the aristocrats, and we are the cooks.
And the gap between us is wider than the London Bridge.
We may be cooks, but when the flavors we create move the hearts of the nobles, in that moment...
I only spoke of my personal wish.
You talk as if it is already been decided.
No matter how much you oppose me, my feelings will not change.
This is not some childish whim!
You told me to consider my responsibilities to the Jones family, and I have.
I have had enough of this talk.
Do you want something to eat?
